DMUMarkupHdr.Title: Markup
DMUMarkupHdr.ShortHelp: Creates a markup linked to the loaded context. If several contexts are loaded in the session, select one in the Markup dialog box.
DMUMarkupHdr.LongHelp: In the Markup dialog box, select a context (if required) and enter a name and description for the markup.
DMUOldMarkupHdr.Title: Old Markup
DMUOldMarkupHdr.ShortHelp: Creates a Old markup linked to the loaded context. If several contexts are loaded in the session, select one in the Markup dialog box.
DMUOldMarkupHdr.LongHelp: In the Markup dialog box, select a context (if required) and enter a name and description for the markup.
DMURenameMarkupHdr.Title: Rename
DMURenameMarkupHdr.ShortHelp: Updates the name of a markup
DMUExportReviewAsPdfHdr.Title: Export as PDF
DMUExportReviewAsPdfHdr.ShortHelp: Exports the markups created on documents along with the annotations and comments to a PDF.
DMUExportReviewAsPdfHdr.LongHelp:
A PDF document is downloaded in the selected destination folder.

This PDF has the same size and orientation as the document on which the markup was created.

You can edit the comments and annotations using other PDF applications after the export.
DMUExportMarkupAsPdfHdr.Title: Export Markup as PDF
DMUExportMarkupAsPdfHdr.ShortHelp: Exports the markups created along with the annotations and comments to a PDF.
DMUExportMarkupAsPdfHdr.LongHelp:
A PDF document is attached to a relational Document on the platform.

This PDF has the same size and orientation as the document on which the markup was created.

You can edit the comments and annotations using other PDF applications after the export.
DMUExportMarkupAsImageHdr.Title: Export Markup Slides as Images
DMUExportMarkupAsImageHdr.ShortHelp: Exports the markups slides created along with the annotations and to images.
DMUExportMarkupAsImageHdr.LongHelp: A folder containing all the slides is generated and linked in a destination document attached to the markup on the platform.
DMUPrintHdr.Title: Print
DMUPrintHdr.ShortHelp: Prints the drawings without annotations and the markups with slides created on documents, 2D and 3D data.
DMUPrintHdr.LongHelp: The annotations for drawings, annotations will not be printed, whereas for documents, 2D and 3D data markups, slides with annotations will be printed.
